name: Losing Control(s)
description:
A game where you fight your way through rooms full of monsters and treasure! If you don't stay for long enough, you won't have enough loot to survive further on. But if you stay for too long, all your controls will be gone!

If you want to beat the boss, in the 12th room, you'll definitely need some skill and practice.

Made in 2 days, for the GMTK game jam 2020.
